text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

SHELLEY VANDENBERG:
After many years

of diving into many professional
development programs,

my interest in
professional education

has been really about
staying relevant.

If you're not
constantly learning,

if you're not
challenging your thinking

or looking at things
in a different way,
you will too become irrelevant.

And this program at
Stanford, the Innovation

and Entrepreneurship
program teaches you
how to think differently.

So before I attended
the program at Stanford,

innovation was still a very
complex and intimidating
concept.

But the program at
Stanford simplified it.

And the faculty made
sense of it for me.

And they really wrapped
innovation, entrepreneurship,

and design thinking
all together.

So now that I've completed
two programs at Stanford,

I can say that Stanford
has never let me down.

After each program, I
walked away with the feeling

that my expectations
were exceeded

and that the return
on the investment

was greater than I
could ever imagine.

Stanford actually
makes it really easy

for you to learn at your
own pace, choose your hours,

choose the courses that
really interest you
and that you want to focus in.

And they provide a
powerful learning platform

that is engaging and
exciting to learn from.

Stanford provides the
best program out there.
I would highly recommend it.
It will change your life.
